org.openimaj.citation

Class ReferenceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.citation.ReferenceListener

  • public class ReferenceListener
extends Object
    Listener that registers instances of Reference annotations.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
